name: 4D Chess (itch)
description:
This is 4D Chess! 

This is a chess on a 4x4x4x4 board, flattened into 3 Dimensions.

While there is a slight learning curve, figuring out the new movement patterns of the classic chess pieces, the game is still fun to play!

With an AI programmed in, you can have fun testing your skills against it, or playing against your friends locally.

Made using vpython
